attributes.action: Have EU referendum TV debates to help people understand both points of view.
attributes.background: To make it fair for everyone to have a better knowledge from both points of view in the EU referendum, tv debates will play a big role in helping people understand where they stand. Also it will put both sides of the argument to see whether or not they can make a persuasive argument.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It would be up to television companies to arrange a debate and to invite people to attend.
